Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1900 A.D.–present
Description: Trade cards from the "Clement Bros. Bread" series (D380 and D380-1), issued 1909-1910 to promote Clement Brothers Bread, Rochester, New York. The D380-1 series, produced in 1909, features players from the Rochester baseball team pictured in an oval image. The D380 series, issued in 1910, displays Major League and Rochester players in a rectangular image.
